summary:
Tired with vanilla magic animation style ? Ever annoyed why a job like mages still act like \"caveman\"? This mod might help. For me, it does.

NEW animation for staff has been released in v0.8 with NMM installer
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]

NEWS
=====
Included in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29622]New Animation Package - Nexus Exclusive[/url]
If you want the motion only apply to you PC (NPC won\'t use it) then you need to visit [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]

I\'ve thinking to make one since longtime ago since vanilla animation for magic are the reason why I\'m not playing as a mage character. Also, there are lot ppl asking whether I made one. If you don\'t like it then you already prefer vanilla or others (maybe). 

[color=yellow]IF YOU :
\"....hate? animations that make your character look like you are relaxing while holding a sword or casting a spell. \"
\"...It looks very stupid to go directly from being relaxed to chopping a person\'s head off or burning them to a crisp\".
\"..movement makes the mage seem like its not taking the fight seriously\" [/color]
[color=orange] THIS MOD IS NOT FOR YOU![/color]

[color=yellow]If you love this mod, It\'ll be great if you vote me XD[/color]

I don\'t mind with \"japanese high school girls when they think something is Kawaii\". In my mind, female mages shouldn\'t looks hulky-bulky. They should act that they actually a beautiful being and move elegantly. Well, we have different view of perspective of \"cool\". If you want keep some then you read the lowest section.

[color=sea]Btw, Animations for male are added[/color]

[center] [youtube]hMoArgPwJEw[/youtube]
by CaptainShack
[/center]

[color=yellow]You can see previous updates changes in \"change logs\"[/color]

v0.8
- Minor fix for idle, right hand casting, etc and etc (don\'t remember)
- New animation for Staff
- Sprint for male
- NMM installer for easier life
- Add some feature from mirap left over mod - for Ritual/Master type spell 
[color=grey]- Add basic movement to fit male character by default
- Minor fix to magic right handed (mrh) ready loop (fix wrist problem)
- Magic sprint isn\\\'t added for male motions ( so it will use vanilla or from other mod)
- All motions are calibrated to match sneaking stances angle (this will reduce lean back problem while sneaking)
- Add New Movement for Turning while casting magic
- Fix \\\"ping-pong\\\" issues with release target motions like \\\"fireball\\\" spell
- Revert magic idle turning movement (non casting) to previous version
- The video sample from previous version (v0.1 - v0.4) might not represent this version anymore. [/color]


[color=yellow]OPTIONAL
============[/color]
[color=orange] Female version of the movement with exclusive path already added in v0.7. To activate female motions so it will distinct with male, it require
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS[/url] installation
2. tick \"gender specific Animations\" patch in \"GenerateFNISforUsers.exe\" application[/color]


PLANNED
========
- Magic sprint stance to fit male
- motion for Ritual spell type animation
- Motions for Movement with staff

\"THERE ARE THAT WE LIKE BUT THERE IS THAT WE DON\"T\"
====================================================
I made this section just in case you want to keep some motion still looks vanilla. Look it inside 
[code]data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\[/code]
just delete any file that you don\'t want to have

- for animation like e.g healing
mrh/mlh_preselfcon.hkx
mrh/mlh_selfconcentration.hkx

- for animation like e.g ward
mrh/mlh_preward.hkx
mrh/mlh_wardloop.hkx 

- e.g flames, lightning
mrh/mlh_preready.hkx
mrh/mlh_preaimedcon.hkx
mrh/mlh_aimedconcentration.hkx

- e.g fireball
mrh/mlh_precharge
mrh/mlh_preready.hkx
mrh/mlh_readyloop.hkx
mrh/mlh_release.hkx

- telekinesis
any files that has a word \"telekinesis\" on the file name

- idle
any files that has a word \"idle\" on the file name

- Movement
any files that has word \"run, walk, turn and sprint\"

RECOMMENDED
==============
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29600]Spell - Levitate - Revamped Edition[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28642]Ultimate HD Fire Spells[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2947]Deadly Spell Impacts[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29137]TK COMBAT[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29085]Grimoas Vampire Lord[/url]
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=1][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vsTyOGf4w70]don\'t click me[/url][/size][/center]
author: xp32

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-1aplha
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-1aplha-28428-0-1alpha.7z
files.changelogHtml: This is still early version since I just done mlh part (magic_left_handed) so there might be some issues.

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-2b
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-2b-28428-0-2b.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Add basic movement for Non casting stance
Change the center of the gravity for motion from previous version to make the stance looks "balanced"

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-3b
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-3b-28428-0-3b.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Add Magic cast movement for Walk and Run (F, B, R, L).
left handed magic and dual equip charge loop for testing
Fix mlh ward loop animation

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-4
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-4-28428-0-4.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Add diagonal movement for casting magic (FL, FR, BL, BR)
Add some measurement for Turning motion to match upper torso for magic casting

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-5
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-5-28428-0-5.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Redone all parts of motion ( fix some miscalculation/bug from previous ver)
several "magic right handed" parts are added
excluded magic sprint animation (available at optional)

files.name: New Animation for magic cast v0-6b
files.fileName: New Animation for magic cast v0-6b-28428-0-6.7z
files.changelogHtml:
All motions are calibrated to match sneaking stances angle (this will reduce lean back problem while sneaking)
Add New Movement for Turning while casting magic
Fix "ping-pong" issues with release target motions like "fireball" spell
Revert magic idle turning movement (non casting) to previous version
